profile.name: Assadiki Yassin
profile.title: Senior frontend Developer
profile.bio: Dedicated to building scalable web applications with clean code, while growing as a full-stack engineer specializing in distributed systems and cloud architecture.

experience.description: Architecting and implementing a cutting-edge SoC configuration platform using modern web technologies and best practices.
highlights: Spearheading the implementation of Domain-Driven Design patterns and CQRS architecture
Leading front-end development with React and Material-UI while ensuring scalable backend solutions with NestJS
Architecting modular components within Theia IDE ecosystem
experience.summary: Contributing to SoC configuration platform development using React, NestJS, and DDD principles

experience.description: Engineered a multilingual educational platform implementing an innovative JSON-based content management system.
highlights: Optimized content delivery and maintenance through structured data architecture
Implemented responsive design principles ensuring cross-platform compatibility
Designed and implemented a scalable multilingual content management system
experience.summary: Developed multilingual educational platform with custom JSON-based CMS

experience.description: Engineered an innovative 3D interactive timeline utilizing Three.js for immersive historical data visualization.
highlights: Implemented complex animations using GreenSock (GSAP) for enhanced user engagement
Integrated vis.js and day.js to create precise historical event tracking and visualization
Optimized 3D rendering performance for smooth user experience across devices
experience.summary: Built interactive 3D historical timeline using Three.js and GSAP

experience.description: Led front-end development by architecting a custom project infrastructure using VueJS and Vuetify.
highlights: Designed and implemented a scalable TypeScript-based architecture
Established Git workflows and best practices for a team of developers
Successfully supported and maintained a platform serving 450+ global users
experience.summary: VueJS/Vuetify TypeScript-based platform for gathering and sharing historical data.

experience.description: Developed citizen service applications for the Belgian Ministry of Finance (SPF).
highlights: Engineered robust data persistence solutions using Hibernate Framework
Implemented secure data handling practices for sensitive government information
Maintained high-availability systems for critical public services
experience.summary: Developed service applications for Belgian Ministry of Finance using Hibernate Framework.

experience.description: Developed UI/UX components library for the European Patent Office in The Hague.
highlights: Created a comprehensive component library using AngularJS and Sass
Implemented atomic design principles for consistent UI development
Established testing protocols using Selenium, Karma, and Jasmine
Managed project workflows using Jira and Trello in an agile environment
experience.summary: Built AngularJS component library for European Patent Office, implementing atomic design principles
